details.script_description: The script runs an MPI application, SDDMM_GPU, on a cluster with 4 nodes. Each node has 28 processors and 1 GPU. It uses CUDA 8.0.44, nvprof, nvidia-smi, and mpiexec. The script runs different configurations of the application by varying the value of K (block size) and appends the performance results to a CSV file.
